author: Ryan Sidle
description: You'd have put your house on Lionel Messi scoring from here.
title: WATCH: Lionel Messi Proves He's Human With Embarrassing Miss | SPORTbible

description: Für Lionel Messi wird es langsam ungemütlich in Spanien. Nach der Abweisung seines Einspruchs gegen eine Verurteilung wegen Steuerhinterziehung könnte der Argentinier den FC Barcelona bald verlassen.
title: Gericht bestätigt Haftstrafe gegen Lionel Messi

author: Cork Gaines, Business Insider
description: Lionel Messi and his father were also fined €2 million (US$2.2 million) each.
title: Lionel Messi's 21-month prison sentence in tax fraud case is upheld, but he is not expected to serve any jail time

author: FourFourTwo
description: Lionel Messi has failed in his appeal against his suspended 21-month prison sentence having been found guilty of tax fraud last year.
title: Lionel Messi loses appeal against 21-month prison sentence

author: talkSPORT
description: A Catalan High Court has today upheld a 21-month prison sentence imposed on Lionel Messi last July for defrauding €4.1 million (£3.4m) from the Treasury between 2007 and 2009.  The Argentina international and his father, Jorge, were found guilty at a Barcelona court last summer, and that decision has now been ratified. The pair are highly unlikely to serve any time in jail, however, as under Spanish law a prison sentence under two years can be served under probation.
title: Lionel Messi's 21-month prison sentence upheld by Catalan High Court

author: FourFourTwo
description: While Gerard Pique believes Lionel Messi deserves a sixth Ballon d'Or, the Spaniard wants to see Gianluigi Buffon win it.
title: Pique wants Buffon to win Ballon d'Or

author: FourFourTwo
description: Barcelona star Lionel Messi has scored more than any LaLiga rival for the fourth time, earning as many Pichichi awards as Ferenc Puskas.
title: One more than Ronaldo: Messi wins fourth 'Pichichi' award

author: FourFourTwo
description: Lionel Messi outscored Cristiano Ronaldo in 2016-17, but how do the Barcelona and Real Madrid greats match up in LaLiga in 2016-17?
title: LaLiga glory for Ronaldo, Pichichi for Messi - how the great rivals compared in 2016-17

description: Spain's Supreme Court on Wednesday confirmed a 21-month jail sentence and two-million-euro ($2.2-million) fine imposed on Lionel Messi for tax fraud, months after the Barcelona football star lodged an appeal.
title: Spain Supreme Court confirms Messi fraud sentence - Times of India

description: Neuer Rückschlag für Lionel Messi. Nachdem der Fußball-Star am Sonntag mit dem FC Barcelona bereits den Titel des spanischen Meisters an Erzrivale Real Madrid hatte abgeben müssen, erlitt er nun vor Gericht eine schlimme persönliche Pleite.
title: Fußball: Steuerbetrug: Hafturteil gegen Messi bestätigt
